work-experience.designation: As   senior   developer,   led   design   and   implementation   of   enterprise   infrastructure   responsible
work-experience.job-description: As   senior   developer,   led   design   and   implementation   of   enterprise   infrastructure   responsible   for   processing   over   $1   billion   daily   in   financial   transactions.   Split   duties   evenly   between   backend   and   frontend   development,   overseeing   redesigns   of   company's   two   major   public-facing   websites:   the   CMS-backed   official   website   and   the   Banking   division's   mission   critical   online   banking   application.   Spearheaded   transition   to   more   modern   development   environment   adopting   tools   like   distributed   version   control,   static   analysis,   and   continuous   integration   to   ease   development   and   improve   productivity.   Software   Developer   First   American   Corporation      Santa   Ana,   California      October   2007   to   September   2012

work-experience.designation: As   developer,   implemented   and   supported   applications   critical   to   the   business   operations   of
work-experience.job-description: As   developer,   implemented   and   supported   applications   critical   to   the   business   operations   of   both   the   Wealth   Management   and   Banking   units.   Within   a   diverse   technical   environment,   carried   critical   projects   forward   to   completion   participating   in   all   stages   of   development,   from   database   and   interface   design   to   testing,   quality   assurance,   and   deployment.   Promoted   best   practices   and   created   resources,   including   wiki,   that   helped   accelerate   development   process,   clarify   coding   standards,   and   improve   maintainability.   Web   Developer   Computer   Specialists,   Inc.      Anaheim,   California      October   2004   to   October   2007

Consulted   for   clients   on   website   projects   drawing   up   proposals,   negotiating   contracts,   and   authoring   specs.   Updated   legacy   scheduling   and   accounting   system   to   optimize   scheduling   process   and   increase   billable   hours.   Redeveloped   company's   intranet   site   around   PHP   open   source   solutions   and   integrated   it   with   existing   management   system   to   significantly   improve   office   workflow.   Web   Developer   Klenwell   Design      Anaheim,   California      September   2000   to   October   2004

work-experience.job-description: Contracted   as   designer   and   developer   specializing   in   dynamic,   standards-compliant   websites   for   the   LAMP   platform.   Implemented   several   popular   open   source   frameworks,   including   Drupal,   Joomla,   Wordpress,   and   Mediawiki.
